snippet: Pope Benedict XVI, speaking in Lebanon amid a wave of violence across the Muslim world, said religious freedom was fundamental to stability.
abstract: Pope Benedict XVI, speaking in Lebanon amid a wave of violence across the Muslim world, says religious freedom is fundamental to stability; implores young Christians not emigrate from Lebanon, but rather to forge closer bonds with Muslim youth.
lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI, speaking in Lebanon amid a wave of violence across the Muslim world, said religious freedom was fundamental to stability.

headline.seo: Pope Benedict XVI, in Lebanon, Makes Plea for Religious Freedom
headline.main: Pope Makes Plea for Religious Freedom
headline.print_headline: Pope Makes Plea for Religious Freedom
